text: André Zacharow (7 July 1939 - 10 September 2021) was a Brazilian economist, lawyer, academic, and politician. He was a Federal Deputy from Paraná from 2003 until 2015. Zacharow was born in Jaguariaíva, Paraná. He was a member of the PDT and MDB. Zacharow died on 10 September 2021 in Curitiba, Paraná at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Brazilian economists Category:Politicians from Paraná State Category:Brazilian lawyers Category:Brazilian academics
title: André Zacharow
